project.title: Space Beat Three

frontmatter.title: Space Beat Three
frontmatter.description: A fun, little game space built on Phaser. Shoot enemies while flying through space.

previous.title: Stellarnauts

frontmatter.title: Stellarnauts
frontmatter.description: A game based around Github. When you close issues in Github, you get points in Stellarnauts!

previous.contentRaw: This project aims to create a package which allows other projects to be gamified by adding points, awards, and/or levels.
